articles.title: Malaysia green-lights new MH370 search in Indian Ocean - BBC.com
articles.description: Malaysia's cabinet approves a fresh search for the missing plane by exploration firm Ocean Infinity.
articles.content:
The Malaysian cabinet has approved a fresh search for the wreckage of Malaysia Airlines flight MH370, more than a decade after the aircraft vanished.
The search will cover a 15,000 sq km area in the… [+4014 chars]
